channel.title: Some reworks for Unseen Investigative Classes
channel.description:
Currently, the Investigative Unseen classes in the game are the most boring set of converts. They serve no real purpose at all and don't do very much. They also usually become assassin anyways after being converted, so even if they were the slightest bit of fun, it wouldn't last long which is why I made a rework or a buff for these classes.
Marshal Rework/Buff New Passive - Detective-Like You will appear as an Investigative class for investigation result. (Passive kept on during class change)
New Passive - Royal Work Ethic You and Unseen will know who is imprisoned every night
New Day Ability - Stalker|AKA Ripoff Scout Select target A and target B (targets cannot be Unseen). If target A visits target B, occupy target A and everyone else visiting target B except for Unseen members. Stays on target until deselected or activated. You may not select the same Target A twice if they have activated Stalker yet. (infinite uses)
New Day Ability - Personal Disguise Choose a member of the Unseen (including yourself) to disguise as sheriff or MM. If they are executed, they will appear as that class. (infinite uses)
Probe Buff Determine and frame a player’s class, if they are part of the Blue Dragon.
Snoop Buff 2 charges ------> 3 charges
Duchess Rework/Buff New Passive - Detective-Like You will appear as an Investigative class for investigation result. (Passive kept on during class change)
New Passive - Guidance If OG Assassin dies before they become MM, you will gain Apprenticeship
New Day Ability - Royal Disguise Choose a member of the Unseen (including yourself) to disguise as princess or MM. If they are executed, they will appear as that class. (infinite uses)
New Day Ability - Royal Decree Choose a person. All of the day abilities the Assassin uses on that person will not be notified to them. (2 uses)
Bat Eyelashes Buff Entrance target player with your eyes into revealing their class type and framing them.
Handmaiden Rework/Buff New Passive - Detective-Like You will appear as an Investigative class for investigation result. (Passive kept on during class change)
New Day Ability - Loyal Disguise Choose a member of the Unseen (including yourself) to disguise as Maid or MM. If they are executed, they will appear as that class. (infinite uses)
New Day Ability - Dissappearing Ink Replace a person's ink with some dissapearing ink, making every change they make to their logbooks not be displayed today and tonight to everyone if they are executed. They will still see the changes but everyone else won't. (3 uses)
Analyze Rework Test and frame 2 players, if they win together, discover their classes. If they don't, silence them tomorrow for the entire day, they will stay be able to use day abilities.
Replace Prying Servant with Feather Duster Hide a player's logbook tonight if they are slain tonight. (2 uses)

item.title: Some reworks for Unseen Investigative Classes
item.dc:creator: katze
item.description:
jotted down my thoughts on each individual change
Intensify:

New Passive - Detective-Like
You will appear as an Investigative class for investigation result. (Passive
kept on during class change)

i don’t see the point in it, it just nerfs princess

and princess isnt strong

Intensify:

New Passive - Royal Work Ethic
You and Unseen will know who is imprisoned every night

3 uses of expose is enough, isn’t it?

Intensify:

New Day Ability - Stalker|AKA Ripoff Scout
Select target A and target B (targets cannot be Unseen). If target A visits
target B, occupy target A and everyone else visiting target B except for
Unseen members. Stays on target until deselected or activated. You may not
select the same Target A twice if they have activated Stalker yet. (infinite uses)

giving marshal a scout-like ability makes sense

this is absurdly powerful though; why does marshal have a day version of wall of fire

Intensify:

New Day Ability - Personal Disguise
Choose a member of the Unseen (including yourself) to disguise as sheriff
or MM. If they are executed, they will appear as that class. (infinite uses)

interesting

part of me doesn’t dislike the concept of more flip altering

but having it be a day ability seems kinda odd? and having it on marshal gives me ehh vibes

Intensify:

Probe Buff
Determine and frame a player’s class, if they are part of the Blue Dragon.

id reword this

Determine a player’s class, if they are part of the Blue Dragon, then frame them.

i think this is a decent potential buff but i’m also not super convinced that marshal even needs a buff, they’re already very frequent converts to remove an invest - they don’t need to be overpoweringly strong as well

Intensify:

Snoop Buff
2 charges ------> 3 charges

shrug

snoop isn’t that good imo so no opinions here

Intensify:

Duchess Rework/Buff
New Passive - Detective-Like
You will appear as an Investigative class for investigation result. (Passive
kept on during class change)

i don’t see the point in it, it just nerfs princess
and princess isnt strong

Intensify:

New Passive - Guidance
If OG Assassin dies before they become MM, you will gain Apprenticeship

i don’t dislike this as a concept but i’d actually want to nerf duchess a bit if this passive were a thing, and probably change this to be a bit more restricted

duchess having dark wisp makes duchess a fairly decent convert and letting it grant a 2nd MM in games where it shouldn’t be possible is, well, also very strong

Intensify:

New Day Ability - Royal Disguise
Choose a member of the Unseen (including yourself) to disguise as princess
or MM. If they are executed, they will appear as that class. (infinite uses)

part of me doesn’t dislike the concept of more flip altering
but having it be a day ability seems kinda odd? and having it on marshal duchess gives me ehh vibes

Intensify:

Bat Eyelashes Buff
Entrance target player with your eyes into revealing their class type and
framing them.

i just realized that you’re suggesting about the same buffs on every invest, aren’t you?

ill start skipping dupes

more frames isn’t inherently bad but not every invest convert needs to be nearly identical, or every invest claim will get policy lynched and that’s way less fun than being a “weak” convert

Intensify:

New Day Ability - Dissappearing Ink
Replace a person’s ink with some dissapearing ink, making every change
they make to their logbooks not be displayed today and tonight to everyone
if they are executed. They will still see the changes but everyone else
won’t. (3 uses)

interesting

i don’t think this is very likely to be easy to code? and it may be kind of obvious that this happened, if the NK is already dead or proven to not be reaper

but i don’t dislike this

Intensify:

Analyze Rework
Test and frame 2 players, if they win together, discover their classes. If
they don’t, silence them tomorrow for the entire day, they will stay be able
to use day abilities.

okay analyze buff

the second part just confirms your existence

Intensify:

Replace Prying Servant with Feather Duster
Hide a player’s logbook tonight if they are slain tonight. (2 uses)

this also confirms the handmaidens existence

tldr: there’s a few very okay ideas here, and a lot of flawed ones imo

making every invest convert nearly identical just sounds more boring than their current “weak” state

for the record, i think duchess and marshal aren’t that bad. duchess is easy to get kinged and marshal gets very decent info while removing a sheriff

handmaiden is weak though

item.title: Some reworks for Unseen Investigative Classes
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
Changing the class type of certain Investigatives converts could make the game more fun. For example, right now Duchess is a weaker Marshal and could be fixed by making their class type change. But I think you looked at what would make the classes more useful, instead of looking at how these solutions would affect the game.

Princess Claims, Sheriffs, and Maid are all going to become untrusted. That is way too much flip changing to where it makes it so certain flips pretty much become “meh, could be unseen anyway ignore the fact they flip”

Like changing Duchess to more of a support type for the unseen could work, right now they are in a weird spot where they are investigative but their flirt is just a weaker marshal.

Read full topic

item.title: Some reworks for Unseen Investigative Classes
item.dc:creator: SirRatus
item.description:
Detective like passive is just a counter to princess only while disguise is a unlimited day ability so you can just use it at the moment the unseen is getting voted instead of predicting it so it’s too powerful

Marshal is too powerful due to having potential unlimited firewall of sage however having frame on probe is nice since aristocrat have that ability on intrigue

For Princess, dark wisp was useful for unseen with escaping from assassin getting found so I don’t think it need change.

For maid, the change for analyze is better since finding two of the same class types is much harder to the point of impossible than finding two of the same win condition. Having both disappearing ink and feather duster on the same person seems to against each other as you can stop from writing their logs or just remove it if you kill them so keeping prying servant instead of replacing it is fine since it was a useful ability to finding NK quickly.

Overall at least the classes have a reason to live longer but they are just too over buffed.
